Not all addresses were successfully geocoded to markers. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to try again. If you keep seeing this error, contact your system administrator.
The API Key could not be fetched from Firebase server. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to try again. If you keep seeing this error, contact your system administrator.
